question_id: Siapa pelanggan dengan total nilai pembayaran terbesar? Sertakan nama depan, nama belakang, dan total pembayarannya.
sql_query:
SELECT
    c.first_name AS nama_depan,
    c.last_name AS nama_belakang,
    SUM(p.amount) AS total_pembayaran
FROM
    customer c
JOIN
    rental r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id
JOIN
    payment p ON r.rental_id = p.rental_id
GROUP BY
    c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name
ORDER BY
    total_pembayaran DESC
LIMIT 1
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    c.first_name AS nama_depan,
    c.last_name AS nama_belakang,
    SUM(p.amount) AS total_pembayaran
FROM
    customer c
JOIN
    rental r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id
JOIN
    payment p ON r.rental_id = p.rental_id
GROUP BY
    c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name
ORDER BY
    total_pembayaran DESC
LIMIT 1;
```
